817330.name: AT SUNDOWN: SitD Soundtrack
817330.description:
Composed by music maestro Kenny Regan, the official soundtrack perfectly complements the action that takes place in the underworld of Sundown City, a once thriving beacon of prosperity now plunged into darkness.

The soundtrack has been completely remastered specifically for your listening pleasure and includes 10 original tracks from the game plus 3 additional bonus tracks!

Tracklist:

1. When the Lights Go Out – Main Menu (2:24)
2. The Floor Lights Up – Disco (4:09)
3. Amused Crickets – Garden (3:15)
4. Metro is Behind Schedule – Subway (2:26)
5. A Shot in the Dark – Training (2:04)
6. Haunted House – Mansion (4:11)
7. Late Paperwork – ??? (2:56)
8. Spacetime Conundrum – ??? (3:26)
9. Unauthorized Manufacturing – Factory (1:39)
10. Nuclear Meltdown – Reactor (3:05)
11. BONUS - Sundown Boulevard – Old Main Menu (1:59)
12. BONUS - Crepuscular Cityscape – Unused Trailer (1:16)
13. BONUS - When the Lights Turn On – Old Training (3:17)
817330.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 韩语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 波兰语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
